p: Flowers of MH were collected at Chiang Rai Province in Thailand in October 2019. The plant material was authenticated by a botanist at the office of the QSNC, Thailand. Flowers were dried at 40°C. Then, drug was powdered by grinder (coarse powder) and macerated with water. The water extracts were lyophilized to dryness and stored at − 20°C.
